body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LDRZ*VdxUTEct5AO3YomrOQI0CUIudKlNhXsP1EZ5jSIgURuXhOn6FMO77SXoiwTUxrx22o0BlUIRwf5F8kqjCZ5AfHOw4OT/file.JPG) Hi I have set up LB and HB on new PC. The installation is seem to be fine. But, when I run HB, I got problem. "Set Exposure Component" is not working although HDR2TIFF component can create image and adjust exposure. Dose anyone have any idea?

replies.body: What if you set adjustExposure to False on HDR2TIFF?

Looks like an error with pfilt. It was a bug on Radiance 4.2 for Windows. If you install newer versions of Radiance, that should solve the problem > [https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/tag/4.2.2](https://github.com/NREL/Radiance/releases/tag/4.2.2)
